New Records: Darius Garland scored a career-high 39 points
Jarrett Allen recorded 14 points, 15 rebounds, and a key block
Cleveland Cavaliers became the second team in history to start 8-0 with every player averaging less than 30 minutes
Key Match Events: Darius Garland made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 45 seconds left
Jarrett Allen had a huge block on Damian Lillard in the final seconds
Damian Lillard committed a costly turnover with 56 seconds left
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland Cavaliers showed resilience without Donovan Mitchell
Milwaukee Bucks struggled without Giannis Antetokounmpo
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland Cavaliers' win was their second in three days over Milwaukee
Milwaukee Bucks had a six-game losing streak
This was not a particularly historical game beyond the mentioned records
